results.title: A story about nan & pop
results.brief_description: Corey Kelly pays tribute to his nan and pop, who have had hard lives but have taught him the meaning of family. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Koorie Heritage Trust Inc.

results.title: Memories of Mookie
results.brief_description: Ben Edwards remembers his cousin Mookie. He was his friend and his hero and he shouldn’t have died. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Koorie Heritage Trust Inc.

results.title: Hoop dreams
results.brief_description: For Phillip Murray basketball is more than just a game, it’s an escape, it’s his life, it’s his passion. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Koorie Heritage Trust Inc.

results.title: My car : my place
results.creator_credit: Bridget Nicholson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bridget Nicholson’s car represents many things to her. More than a way to get from A to B, her car is a private place, a safe place and has intensified the freedom of travel. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.

results.title: Home
results.creator_credit: Zephlyn Neilsen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Zephlyn Neilsen reflects on the meaning of home through her recollections of growing up in rural Victoria. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.

results.title: Yellow gloves
results.creator_credit: Lyn Johnson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Originally a city girl, Lyn Johnson wondered if she was cut out to be a farmers wife but a pair of yellow gloves changed everything. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.

results.title: Friendship in a biscuit tin
results.creator_credit: Vivianne Everett, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Vivianne Everett pays homage to her friend Vikki who has taught her awareness and acceptance, while celebrating a life long friendship that has stood the test of time. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.

results.title: Outside in
results.brief_description:
Beautiful 3-d computer animated tale of fantasy and magic when three individual lives are entwined through a twist of fate allowing their true nature to surface in a most unexpected way. No spoken word.
Created as part of Master of Fine Arts Degree in Image Arts/Computer Animation, School of Film and Animation, Rochester Institute of Technology, New York.
